description:
The director informs Nishioka the conditions for Daitokai`s continuation, which are the revision of another dictionary and Nishioka’s transfer to the marketing department. Nishioka`s shocked, but seeing the team`s joy with the sample copies of Daitokai, and Majime starting the revision work, he vows to do all he can before his transfer.Later, Majime works up the courage to hand Kaguya his letter.
Source: Amazon
